name: Skater Boy
description:
Wanna play fast, challenging, funny skateboarding game? You should try this Skater Boy. A pixel-style casual game, I'm sure you will be addicted to this game after you played through the first 3 levels.
★ 3 Lives for each level and just try not to fail the late levels.
★ 30 levels challenge
★ Every time you play, there's always a new adventure awaiting for you to play through.
